name: tsna2
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylibr(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))

|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)), wo(w1, wn(wa(w1, w2))))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wo(w1, wnan(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wnan(w1, w2), wn(wa(w1, w2)))

comment: A Tseitin axiom for logical incompatibility, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
